channel.title: CVE Feed for YITH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YITH -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35698|2024-06-08T14:19:22.304Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20tab%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Tab Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Tab Manager: from n/a through 1.35.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-35732|2024-06-08T12:52:23.361Z -- yith -- yith%20custom%20login
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH Custom Login allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YITH Custom Login: from n/a through 1.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-34385|2024-06-03T11:41:00.230Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20wishlist
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Wishlist allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Wishlist: from n/a through 3.32.0.
